Superior Night Vision Dash Cam: 6 unique infrared LED fill lights allows the dash cam to perform optimally in low light situations. WDR technology allows for the best night video.

170° Wide Angle Dash Cam & 6G Lens : Combined with Sony sensor and 6 glass lens and 170 Degree wide angle lens allows COMS get more clear images. High-performance chipset which enables you to take up to 1080P 30fps full HD videos and 12MP pictures.

Intelligent Operation: G-sensor activated Emergency Recording automatically captures unexpected driving incidents and protects the recordings. Loop Recording allows continuous use by writing over old, unneeded footage. Note: Operation requires a micro SD Card (Support up to 32GB Card Not Included)

Easy Operation & Guarantee: Easily and securely mount to your windshield in seconds with the included suction cup. We also provide 12 months guarantee, with a qualified after-sale service team, 7 days/ 24 hours for serving you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ORSKEY CameraCore The CameraCore Series combines the best camera, refined design, and the industry's most advanced manufacturing processes, allowing you to create amazing videos and record and enjoy the highlights of life. Package Contents 1X ORSKEY Dash Cam 1X Rear Camera 1X Car Power Cable(3.5m) 1X Mini USB Cable 1X Car Mount 1X User Manual ORSKEY CameraCore S800 -ORSKEY Full HD 1080P Front and Rear Dash Camera Equipped with a superior chip and Sony sensor, the product brings you obvious video, recording your wonderful trips and ensuring you’re driving safe and joyful. We provide you with excellent video sharpness and remarkable product quality at an unbelievably good value. Peace of Mind Included ORSKEY provide camera accessory (suction cup, car charger and extension cable). If you need it, reach us for help. 170° Super Wide Angle Built In G-sensor Super Night Vision Seamless Loop Recording Motion Detection Parking Monitor

3" Ultra Clear LCD Screen 3" Super large LCD that can show the real-time image helps you see every detail as clearly as possible when playing back and brings a better visual experience. Super Night Vision Capture Every Detail. A cutting-edge Sony sensor, six unique infrared LED fill lights, and a unique High Dynamic Range video system provide the best nighttime capture possible. Wide-Angle The 170° wide-angle front camera quickly covers four channels without visual blind spots, providing you and your vehicle with all-around protection. The 140° wide-angle, waterproof rear dash camera with 4 LED lights helps capture more details of the road around you. This ensures a panoramic recording; never miss an event ahead and the rear of your vehicle.

High Dynamic Range Exposure is automatically fine-tuned to create balanced images and footage in any light conditions. Seamless Loop recording Seamless Loop recording will record the video on 1 /2 /3 /5 minutes clips and automatically overwrites the newest ones. Emergency Lock Seamless loop recording plus G-sensor with collision detection emergency locks video to event folder following impact. The video will not be overwritten when the built-in gravity sensor detects a sudden shake or collision.

Kindly Reminder Please format the sd card on your camera directly.Before you start using a new memory card,you must format the card within the camera using the format function.The built in battery just for emergency file backup and save settings,please always keep the dash cam plugged in.The car USB port may not support enough power for the dash cam,please use the car charger that comes with the dash camCamera Requirements: Class 10 or higher Micro SD Memory card up to 32GB(Not Included) Easy Installation The materials and design of the ORSKEY Dash Camera have been selected to ensure the camera is easy to mount and will stay in place while driving. The dash camera doesn't require any exhausting methods to install Warm Tips： Please adjust the sensitivity of G-sensor to Low or turn it off ,the video file will be easily locked when your car brake,even if the loop recording function of the dash cam is turned on Please kindly turn off the "Motion Detection" function while driving to ensure seamless video recording. When the dash cam prompts 'SD card FULL', it will turn off automatically to remind you to format sd card and reset it. Please follow these steps to solve the issue.1. Turn off G-sensor, motion detection and Parking mode 2.Please use the Lock function when you need to save a video without being overwritten

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressive camera..
reviews.reviewText: I was kind of skeptical about purchasing the camera because of the ridiculous low price...but boy i was impressed...very good image...super mega easy to imstall....the menu on the camera super easy....overall 👌 it was a great purchase....highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for price
reviews.reviewText: The camera itself is of good quality and the rearview camera is a nice option. The screen itself could be a bit bigger but is adequate. The picture resolution and quality are very nice and the anti-shaking feature works well. The suction cup mount would not hold but s tape mount is also included, and I hope that will hold better.Installation of the cameras is not easy and did not work well with the Prius. There are a lot of wires to tuck away and hide which requires some disablement of the car. A wireless version would be nice. The instructions on install are not very helpful. I had to google a video to get help. The red wire for the rear-view camera has to be attached to the brake lights and I am not car savvy enough to know how to disassemble the car to do this as well as hide all the wires. To get the cameras set up properly I will either have to hire someone or find volunteer their time and help.I do not have a SD Card, so I was not able to play with all the options but reading through the manual I like how there is sever recording options. In particular, I like the fact the camera can record for 24 hours whether the car is off or on. I also like the motion detection setting. If something happens to your car while you away these options can help track down the culprit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars compact and solid quality dash cams for its price range
reviews.reviewText: I am pleasantly surprised by its compact size when I opened the box and delighted to see the solid build of both front and back cameras for its price range (I paid $54.99 + 32GB Samsung MicroSD card). Took me about 10 minutes to set up the first time since I did not bother to hide the power cable and connection cable from the rear cam, in case I don't like it or it has quality issues. I will try it for few days, if I like it I will then make the efforts to hide the cables behind the dashboard and side panels. There are many YouTube videos showing you how to do it.I initially used the suction cup on the front windshield, since some comments here stated that it may fall, so I wrapped the power cable around my rear-view mirror in case the suction cup does fall, the camera will not drop to the floor. Unfortunately during my test drive for an hour, it did fall off couple of times. So I changed to the adhesive mount instead. For the rear camera, the little adhesive pad just does not do its job, so I used the screws to fix it to the ceiling panel. I have an 8-seat 3-row SUV, the extension cable that's included in the package is long enough to cover the whole length from front to the back and still has some slack. Maybe your car is longer or you need to run the cable to the bottom license plate area, then you may need to order a longer cable extension.Powered it on and drove out for a test drive. I did not even need to format the 32 GB Class 10 SD-card and it started recording. The on-camera display can be toggled between front, rear and both on a split screen with different sizes. After a while I noticed the camera became really hot to the touch, so I turned on the screen saver mode (while still recording), this cools down the unit a bit, and let me focus on the road. Later when I got home I took the SD card out and inserted it to my PC card reader to view the videos (you can also take the entire front camera out and connect it with PC via the included USB cable). The front images are clear, the rear ones a bit blurry, but still OK as long as you don't try too hard to read their license plates.One more thing I see people here complaining is that the rear cam video image is mirror-reversed. This maybe a good or bad factor depending on how you view it. Your rear-view mirror is also giving you the exactly same reversed image, so the camera shows the same on its display. If it does not, it may confuse you since your brain has been trained to the rear-view mirror reverse images. Of course when you play the video on your computer, you see a reversed image and feel it's strange.Another issue is the 32 GB SD card is a bit small. I drove about 3 hours this Sunday and it's full. The front and back camera each writes a lot of large files to the storage, especially when you choose the highest resolution.Pro: price, quality, ease of installationCon: suction cup, 32 GB storage too small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The dash cam is a game-changer for any driver concerned about safety and accountability on the road. Its crystal-clear video quality captures every detail, providing invaluable evidence in case of accidents or disputes. Easy installation, user-friendly controls, and reliable performance make this dash cam an essential and top-notch investment for peace of mind while driving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars STAY AWAY IF YOU LIVE IN THE SOUTH!!!! MUST READ BEFORE YOU BUY!
reviews.reviewText: Scroll down for major complaint (second paragraph). Ok so I am the type of person where I really like a clean setup and the wires are hidden. First time having to run wires throughout the car. I decided to route my rearview camera on the exterior. Firstly, my issue was the adhesive that came with the rearview did not stick. I had to go out and purchase some exterior 3M tape from autozone in order to get that setup. By the way, it can be a real pain to wire that the first time so you might want have a couple (like 2-3) hours to spare or you'll find yourself with a dangling camera on the back (hello new scratches on my new car). Used WD-40 on the exterior before placing the adhesive which cleaned the spot up just right to place the camera. When it rains, no good use for the rearview image due to droplets of rain. Also, look at the space above your license plate to confirm if this is a good fit for you, or hassle. Camera position can get wonky so it is just a camera, not a good use for back up camera as you have to place your foot on the break to have that view or you'll find yourself switching the main view which is not worth it.I was kind of hesitant to buy this living in south Florida. Seemed to stick just fine. Last day to return was August 15 (who would want to return something they spent so much time wiring and lives a busy life?), it is now August 18th. First fall was on the 16th. I thought to myself, "Eh, no biggie, I will just clean the window and stick it back on." Haha boy was I fooled, and feel played. So the camera and their functions are decent for the price. Not worth a SINGLE CENT if the functions are completely worthless because it cannot properly stay in place. For that, a single star rating as I am out of $50.00 (medical student so I can't buy another one) now and for at least 3 months cannot venture another product. Not worth getting a new one to have to rewire it or spend all that allocated time with the hassle. Now I have wires in my car with no function. Talk about useless.
Puede mejorar con un cable de la cámara posterior más largo, tomando en cuenta las dimensiones de una camioneta, esta diseñada con ese tamaño del cable como para un automovil

reviews.reviewTitle: For this price, its does the job
reviews.reviewText: I'm using it on my 2010 Mazda 3. The installation process was easy, and the video quality is decent for the price. However, the suction power could be improved; I've had to reattach it to my windshield five times since purchasing this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great value for money - punches above its weight for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This little camera was a doddle to fit, and at the price I think it punches well above it's weight as they say. To get both front and rear cameras for simultaneous dual recording, at this price, I think is excellent value for money. The picture quality of the front camera is pretty good, the rear camera perhaps slightly less so, but again, for the money, I'm more than happy. The camera case actually feels quite well made too, and the sticky pad on the windscreen mount felt pretty strong when I stuck it on. I've only just fitted it today so can't comment on the night time picture quality yet - I'll leave that for others to comment on.
Buona cash cam ad un prezzo molto interessante (35 euro).
